dataFolder.appDataDesc: Default location for messages and other user data

others.spellCheckDesc: Turn on to enable spell check chat input.
others.resetFactoryDesc: Restore application to its initial state, erasing all models and chat history. This action is irreversible and recommended only if the application is corrupted

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.themeDesc: Native appearance for consistent theming across OS UI elements
appearance.fontSizeDesc: Adjust the size of text across the app
appearance.appMainViewDesc: Sets the background color for the main content area
appearance.primaryDesc: Controls the primary color used for components
appearance.accentDesc: Controls the accent color used for highlights
appearance.destructiveDesc: Controls the color used for destructive actions
appearance.resetToDefaultDesc: Reset all colors to their default values
appearance.resetAppearanceSuccessDesc: Your appearance settings have been restored to default.
appearance.chatWidthDesc: Choose the width of the chat area to customize your conversation view.
appearance.codeBlockDesc: Choose the style for code block syntax highlighting
appearance.showLineNumbersDesc: Toggle line numbers in code blocks
appearance.resetCodeBlockStyleDesc: Reset code block style to default
appearance.resetCodeBlockSuccessDesc: Your Code Block style settings have been restored to default.

general.checkForUpdatesDesc: Check if a newer version of Jan is available
general.noUpdateAvailable: You are using the latest version of Jan!
general.updateError: Failed to check for updates. Please try again later.
general.devVersion: You are running a development version of Jan!
general.revealLogs: Reveal logs folder in file explorer
general.factoryResetDesc: Are you sure you want to reset the app to factory settings? This action is irreversible and recommended only if the application is corrupted.
general.documentationDesc: Learn how to use Jan and explore its features
general.releaseNotesDesc: See what's new in the latest version
general.discordDesc: Join our community for support and discussions
general.reportAnIssueDesc: Found a bug? Let us know on GitHub
general.creditsDesc1: Jan is built with ❤️ by the Jan team and contributors from around the world.
general.creditsDesc2: Special thanks to all our open-source dependencies and the amazing AI community.
general.failedToRelocateDataFolder: Failed to relocate Jan data folder
general.failedToRelocateDataFolderDesc: Failed to relocate data folder. Please try again or choose a different location.

hardware.name: Name
hardware.enableVulkanDesc: Enable Vulkan API for GPU acceleration

httpsProxy.proxyUrlDesc: URL and port of your proxy server.
httpsProxy.authenticationDesc: Credentials for your proxy server (if required).
httpsProxy.noProxyDesc: List of hosts that should bypass the proxy.
httpsProxy.ignoreSslDesc: Allow self-signed or unverified certificates (may be required for certain proxies). Enable this reduces security. Only use this if you trust your proxy server.
httpsProxy.proxySslDesc: Validate SSL certificate when connecting to the proxy server.
httpsProxy.proxyHostSslDesc: Validate SSL certificate of the proxy server host.
httpsProxy.peerSslDesc: Validate SSL certificate of the peer connections.
httpsProxy.hostSslDesc: Validate SSL certificate of destination hosts.

localApiServer.title: Local API Server
localApiServer.description: Start an OpenAI-compatible local HTTP server.
localApiServer.serverLogsDesc: View detailed logs of the local API server
localApiServer.serverPortDesc: Set the port number for the API server
localApiServer.apiKeyDesc: Authenticate requests with an API key
localApiServer.trustedHostsDesc: Add trusted hosts that can access the API server
localApiServer.corsDesc: Allow requests from different origins to access the API
localApiServer.verboseLogsDesc: Enable detailed logging for debugging purposes

mcpServers.title: MCP Servers
mcpServers.allowPermissionsDesc: When enabled, all MCP tool calls will be automatically approved without showing permission dialogs.
mcpServers.checkParams: Please check the parameters according to the tutorial.

privacy.helpUsImproveDesc: By opting in, you help us make Jan better by sharing anonymous data, like feature usage and user counts. Your chats and personal information are never collected.
privacy.privacyPolicy: We prioritize your control over your data. Learn more about our Privacy Policy.
privacy.analyticsDesc: To make Jan better, we need to understand how it’s used - but only if you choose to help. You can change your Jan Analytics settings anytime.
privacy.privacyPromises: Your choice to opt-in or out doesn't change our core privacy promises:
privacy.promise5: Your chat history and settings stay on your device

shortcuts.newLineDesc: Insert a new line in the message

changeDataFolder.title: Change Data Folder Location
changeDataFolder.description: Are you sure you want to change the data folder location? This will move all your data to the new location and restart the application.

ui.appUpdateDownloadedDesc: The app update has been downloaded successfully.
ui.appUpdateDownloadFailedDesc: Failed to download the app update. Please try again.
ui.deleteAllThreadsDesc: All threads will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
ui.deleteThreadDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this thread? This action cannot be undone.

systemMonitor.noActiveGpus: No active GPUs. All GPUs are currently disabled.
systemMonitor.title: System Monitor
